com.poesys.accounting.bs.account

Class AbstractFiscalYearDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDaoDelegate<S>
      • com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsFiscalYear,IFiscalYear,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>
        • com.poesys.accounting.bs.account.AbstractFiscalYearDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.poesys.bs.delegate.IDataDelegate<BsFiscalYear,IFiscalYear,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiscalYearDelegate

    public abstract class AbstractFiscalYearDelegate
extends com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractDataDelegate<BsFiscalYear,IFiscalYear,com.poesys.db.pk.NaturalPrimaryKey>

    A business delegate that provides an application programming interface for FiscalYear objects and their dependents. You should not modify this class; instead, override or add methods in the class FiscalYearDelegate, which specializes this class.

    An accounting period, usually either coterminous with a calendar year with the same name or varying over an annual period starting on a particular calendar date within the year; identifies a complete accounting period for statements

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
    See Also:
    FiscalYearDelegate

      • createFiscalYear

        public BsFiscalYear createFiscalYear(java.lang.Integer year,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp startDate,
                                     java.sql.Timestamp endDate)
                              throws com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException

        Create a new FiscalYear with data fields.

        The FiscalYear class has a natural key; this method creates the primary key from the appropriate input properties.

        Parameters:
        year - the fiscal year, a year value corresponding to the calendar year of the last day of an accounting period
        startDate - the calendar day of the first day of the accounting period
        endDate - the last calendar day of the accounting period; year corresponds to the fiscal year number
        Returns:
        the new FiscalYear object
        Throws:
        com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException - when there is a problem generating the key or creating the object

      • createFiscalYearAccount

        public BsFiscalYearAccount createFiscalYearAccount(BsAccount accountsObject,
                                                   BsAccountGroup groupObject,
                                                   BsFiscalYear yearsObject,
                                                   java.lang.String accountName,
                                                   java.lang.String entityName,
                                                   java.lang.Integer year,
                                                   java.lang.Integer accountOrderNumber,
                                                   java.lang.Integer groupOrderNumber,
                                                   java.lang.String accountType,
                                                   java.lang.String groupName,
                                                   IAccountGroup group)
                                            throws com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException
        Create a new FiscalYearAccount association class child of FiscalYear with an association key. This class links the input objects.
        Parameters:
        accountsObject - associated Account object (part of the key)
        groupObject - associated AccountGroup object (part of the key)
        yearsObject - associated FiscalYear object (part of the key)
        accountName - Attribute that is part of the association key
        entityName - Attribute that is part of the association key
        year - Attribute that is part of the association key
        accountOrderNumber - the integer rank order of the account within the associated account group for this fiscal year; the numbers form an ordering of all the objects with the same fiscal year, and different fiscal years start from one, so there are duplicate order numbers across fiscal years
        groupOrderNumber - the integer rank order of the account group within the account type associated with the group for this fiscal year; the numbers form a rank order for groups within types for each fiscal year, and the rank order repeats for different fiscal years, resulting in duplicate order numbers in different fiscal years
        accountType - foreign key used by setter to query associated object
        groupName - foreign key used by setter to query associated object
        group - the group into which the account is aggregated
        Returns:
        a new FiscalYearAccount business layer DTO
        Throws:
        com.poesys.bs.delegate.DelegateException - when a parameter causes a problem
